name: 6th International Conference on Food Chemistry, Nutrition and Safety
content: Conference Series LLC ltd with immense pleasure invites all the contributors across the globe to the 6th international conference on food chemistry,,nutrition and safety during November 10-11, 2022 Vancouver, Canada, focusing on the theme “covid-19 prevention using food chemistry and nutrition by enhancing immunity ”Which includes prompt keynote presentations, Oral talks, Poster presentations and Exhibitions.

full: Pacific Gateway Vancouver Airport 3500 Cessna Dr
location.city: Pacific Gateway Vancouver Airport 3500 Cessna Dr
